pages.title: Ant Nests
pages.text:
Ant Nests randomly generate throughout forest biomes.
They consist out of an $(l:antsportation:blocks/ant_nest)Ant Nest() with an $(l:antsportation:blocks/ant_hill)Ant Hill$() on top and when you break them they will spawn some $(l:antsportation:entities/soldier_ant)Soldier Ants$() and an $(l:antsportation:entities/ant_queen)Ant Queen!$()
